title: Viad Corp Declares Quarterly Dividend
text:
PHOENIX--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The board of directors of Viad Corp (NYSE:VVI) declared a quarterly dividend of $0.10 per share on the common stock of Viad. The dividend is payable July 2, 2018, to stockholders of record on June 1, 2018.
About Viad
Viad (NYSE: VVI) generates revenue and shareholder value through two business units: GES and Pursuit. GES is a global, full-service live events company offering a comprehensive range of services to the world's leading brands and event organizers. Pursuit is a collection of iconic travel experiences in Alaska, Montana and Western Canada that showcase the best of Banff, Jasper, Waterton Lakes, Glacier, Denali and Kenai Fjords national parks. Viad is an S&P SmallCap 600 company. For more information, visit the company's Website at www.viad.com .
